Name: Lonza the Bounty Hunter
About the game: Lonza Chaku-Kwali sets out to defeat the wicked galactic king Otoyama, but must first defeat his henchmen and the mega-fleet of doom backing him up. Take flight as the infamous bounty hunter and battle through it all to end the reign of terror. For fans of shmups and fast-paced 2D action, or anyone looking for a challenge . INCLUDES : 60 levels and 7 boss fights 3 gameplay styles: top-down, side-scrolling, arena (20 levels each) endless arcade mode (3 difficulty modes) WARNING: at the end of boss fights there are explosions and flashing lights that might cause problems for users with PHOTO-SENSITIVITY/EPILEPSY issues
